data.author: Lith
data.code:
/* v1.407 创建表SysData
    2020-10-09 16:01 Lith
*/

--(x.1)创建表
if   object_id('SysData_Data') is null
CREATE TABLE [SysData_Data] (
    [id] int NOT NULL IDENTITY,
    [pId] int NULL,
    [name] nvarchar(1000) NULL,
    [value] nvarchar(1000) NULL,
    [dataCode] nvarchar(100) NULL,
    [dataGroup] nvarchar(100) NULL,
    [sortCode] nvarchar(100) NULL,
    [remarks] nvarchar(1000) NULL,
    [ext1] nvarchar(1000) NULL,
    [ext2] nvarchar(1000) NULL,
    [ext3] nvarchar(1000) NULL,
    [ext4] nvarchar(1000) NULL,
    [ext5] nvarchar(1000) NULL,
    CONSTRAINT [PK_SysData_Data] PRIMARY KEY ([id])
);



--(x.2)创建索引
if not exists (SELECT 1 FROM sys.indexes WHERE object_id=OBJECT_ID('SysData_Data', N'U') and NAME='Index_SysData_Data_pId_dataCode_dataGroup')
	create index Index_SysData_Data_pId_dataCode on SysData_Data(pId,dataCode,dataGroup) ;

data.author: Lith
Lith
